name: The Pumpkin Man
description:
hi i am prem more  im a newbie game dev i develop games in unity and loves to do it     so i decided to do my very frst game jam so i chose the spooktoober game jam and it was very fun it took me about 5 days to complete the game from scratch wanna see how created the game from scratch? go to my youtube channel might have made a video about but i think it may not be ready but one things for sure you will subscribe     my youtube channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCMfNeXHQYGEOwSSJYPihQnQ?view_as=subscriber

also subscribe evan king he made all the music in the game                                                             his youtube channel : https://www.youtube.com/user/EvanKingAudio
